Hey Barry, from R E Haynes index of sword fittings.

SHIGEHARU (H08222.0)

Nara, hisname was JUBEI, he worked in Kando in Edo. Died 1775

Seems to have lived to the age of 70. Student of Nara Toshinaga

That's all except for a listing in the Mosel collection. (page 287 Item 920)

 I will try and dig up a meifor you tomorrow and email it over mate.

Rich

Barry Thomas wrote:
> Dear All,
>  
> A friend of mine has a lovely fuchigashira by Shigeharu.  I'm a blade 
> man and don't have so many fittings books, certainly not the "bibles", 
> so I have trawled the web looking for info on Shigeharu and have found 
> nothing so far.  Does anyone have any info on this artisan that they 
> could post on the list??
>  
> With thanks,
>  
> Barry Thomas
